description:
Versatile pants for everyday winter adventures or hiking through the snow. The tough fabric and DWR (durable water repellent) finish sheds light rain and snowfall.

  • Water-resistant soft shell fabric is made of a durable blend of nylon and polyester with a hint of spandex for range of movement
  • Soft brushed lining is bonded to the exterior fabric
  • Fixed waistband with belt loops and hidden adjustable waistband for a perfect fit
  • Zippered fly with a snap closure
  • 2 front slash pockets and 1 thigh pocket with hook-and-loop closure to hold small essentials
  • Articulated knees and gusseted crotch for easy movement
name: MEC Surplus Pants - Youths
